initialView.heyThere:
**Functional Purpose**: Greeting message
**UI Location**: Seniority Survey Modal â†’ Initial View (heading)
**When Users See This**: When the Seniority Survey modal first opens
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Hey there ðŸ‘‹"
initialView.expandingExercism:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about the purpose of the survey
**UI Location**: Seniority Survey Modal â†’ Initial View (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When the Seniority Survey modal first opens
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "We're expanding Exercism to add content relevant to a wide range of abilities. To ensure Exercism shows you the right content, please tell us how experienced you are."
initialView.howExperiencedAreYou:
**Functional Purpose**: Question asking about developer experience
**UI Location**: Seniority Survey Modal â†’ Initial View (sub-heading)
**When Users See This**: When the Seniority Survey modal first opens
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "How experienced a developer are you?"
initialView.absoluteBeginner:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'Absolute Beginner' seniority level option
**UI Location**: Seniority Survey Modal â†’ Initial View (selection button)
**When Users See This**: When presented with seniority level choices
**Technical Context**: Used in a dynamic key `initialView.${seniority.key}`. The `seniority.key` variable must remain unchanged as 'absoluteBeginner'.
**Current English**: "Absolute Beginner"

initialView.saveMyChoice:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to save the selected seniority level
**UI Location**: Seniority Survey Modal â†’ Initial View (primary action button)

**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting

initialView.canBeUpdatedInSettings:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational note about updating the seniority level later
**UI Location**: Seniority Survey Modal â†’ Initial View (small text below the save button)
**When Users See This**: When the Seniority Survey modal is open
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "(This can be updated at any time in your settings)"
